Andy Burton - Bass
Steve Todd - Drums
James Garbett - Drums
Andy Mitchell - Guitar
Andy Deal - Bass
Tony Walsworth - Vocals
Additional notes
In September of 2004 Toranaga started recording their latest album, but only seven incomplete songs were recorded due to James Garbett leaving the band due to educational purposes. Guitarist Mitchell emigrated in 2006 to Australia.
Tony Walsworth lives in New Zealand
